alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lafayette; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:47PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ray, southwestern Lafayette and northeastern Jackson Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 747 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buckner, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Independence, Blue Springs, Grain Valley, Oak Grove, Odessa, Lexington, Buckner, Wellington, Sibley, Mayview, Levasy, Napoleon and Bates City. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 25 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Missouri.
